Flub.Name: A
Flub.Description: A surface with strong protrusions and more chaos.

Flub.Name: B
Flub.Description: A surface with fewer protrusions and mild chaos.

Flub.Name: Size
Flub.Description: Size of the cracks within the rock.

Flub.Name: Small Rocks
Flub.Description: The amount of smaller rocks or debris that should be exposed.

Flub.Name: Breakage
Flub.Description: The granularity of the debris in the broken portions of the rock surface.

Flub.Name: Roughness
Flub.Description: Warping of the smoother surface shapes.

Flub.Name: Jitter
Flub.Description: A useful utility for shifting shapes for artistic decision making.

Flub.Name: Erosion
Flub.Description: If checked, it would run erosion pass on the rocky surface.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
